query: What are the safety requirements for handling hazardous materials?
answer: Based on historical documents, the safety requirements for handling hazardous materials include: (1) Personal protective equipment (PPE) must be worn at all times [Document: Doc-Q1, Page: 12], (2) Materials must be stored in approved containers [Document: Doc-Q1, Page: 15], and (3) All handling must be documented in the safety log [Document: Doc-Q4, Page: 8]. Note: Current document does not specify training requirements, which were mentioned in historical documents.

citations.excerpt: All personnel handling hazardous materials must wear appropriate PPE including gloves, safety glasses, and lab coats.
Hazardous materials must be stored in containers approved by the safety department and labeled according to regulatory standards.
All handling of hazardous materials must be logged in the safety log with date, time, material name, and handler name.
